Name:
Vixen
Sioux
Fate:
Transferred to the Royal Canadian Navy 1944
Scrapped at La Spezia, Italy, August 1965
Badge: Argent, a Sioux Indian head proper facing the dexter and wearing an appropriate feather head-dress of a Sioux Chief[1]
Propulsion:
2 × Admiralty 3-drum water-tube boilers
Geared steam turbines, 40,000 shp (29,828 kW)
2 shafts
Armament:
4 × QF 4.7-inch (120-mm) Mk IX guns (2×2)
6 × QF 20 mm Oerlikon guns (2×2, 2×1)
4 × 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
2 × Squid triple ASW mortars
